alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 12 at 6:39PM MST until December 13 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25-35 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front, particularly near canyons. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will be from 3-9 AM Wednesday near the mouths of Farmington and Weber Canyons. Winds of similar speeds are not expected to reach far from canyon mouths. Gusts of 25-35 mph are expected for Ogden, Layton, and Bountiful.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
